Package ohos.agp.text.richstyles

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ClickRichStyle.ClickListener
    Provides the listener for click events.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AlignmentRichStyle
    Implements the alignment style, which allows you to specify the text alignment mode for a section.
    BackgroundColorRichStyle
    Implements rich styles for the background color.
    ClickRichStyle
    Implements the click style, which allows you to specify the text click behavior.
    FontRichStyle
    Implements rich styles for fonts.
    FontSizeRichStyle
    Implements rich styles for font sizes.
    ForegroundColorRichStyle
    Implements rich styles for the foreground color.
    HorizontalScaleRichStyle
    Implements horizontal scale ratios for the text.
    ImageRichStyle
    Implements rich styles for images inserted into the text.
    IndentRichStyle
    Implements rich styles for paragraph indentation.
    LineBackgroundRichStyle
    Defines the line background rich styles.
    LineHeightRichStyle
    Defines rich styles for the line height.
    RangedRichStyle
    Defines the data structure, including the rich style object, coverage, and inclusion relationship, after the rich style is applied to the rich text.
    RichStyle
    An abstract base class that defines the types and capabilities of rich styles.
    RichStyle.Capability
    Implements capabilities of rich styles.
    StrikeThroughRichStyle
    Implements strikethrough rich styles.
    SubscriptRichStyle
    Implements subscript rich styles.
    SuperscriptRichStyle
    Implements superscript rich styles.
    TabStopsRichStyle
    Implements the tab stop rich style, which allows you to specify possible tab stops in each paragraph.
    UnderlineRichStyle
    Implements underline rich styles, such as underlining characters and setting the underline color.
    UrlRichStyle
    Implements URL rich styles, such as setting a URL string as a hyperlink.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ImageRichStyle.ImageAlignment
    Enumerates vertical alignment modes of an image in the line where the image is located.
    RangedRichStyle.Flag
    Defines the inclusion relationship of a rich style applied to rich text.
    RichStyle.TypeId
    Implements type IDs of rich styles.
